Posts.Title: 3wk plus boost vs. 6 wk radiation? arbella arbella

Posts.Content: arbella wrote: hi ladies i am trying to decide which is the best course of treatment...the traditional 6 wk radiation or the 3 wk plus boost. i understand that sometimes there is some cosmetic issue with hardening skin and shrinkage of size with the 3 wk plus boost. also, what does the boost actually mean? is that done during the 3 wks or afterward? thank you for your input. arbella Dx 8/26/2009, IDC, <1cm, Stage IB, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
